extDescription.message: Hover mouse over images to enlarge them. Supports many sites such as Reddit, Amazon, Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, etc
extDescription.description: Extension description in Chrome webstore (max. 132 characters)

popDisableForSite.description: [popup] Disables the extension for a specific site

popEnableForSite.description: [popup] Enables the extension for a specific site

optActionKeyDescription.message: If a key is set, Hover Zoom+ will be active only when this key is held down.

optHideKeyDescription.message: Holding this key down hides the zoomed picture. Use it when the picture hides elements that are also displayed on mouseover.

optOpenImageInWindowKeyTitle.message: Open image in a new window

optOpenImageInWindowKeyDescription.message: Press this key to open the image you are currently viewing in a new window. Press this key again to close the window.

optOpenImageInTabKeyTitle.message: Open image in a new tab

optOpenImageInTabKeyDescription.message: Press this key to open the image you are currently viewing in a new tab. Press this key again to close the tab. Shift+key opens the image in a background tab.

optSaveImageKeyDescription.message: Press this key to save the image you are currently viewing.

optFullZoomKeyDescription.message: When this key is held down, the picture is displayed using all available space. Useful for high resolution pictures only.

optPrevImgKeyTitle.message: View previous image in a gallery

optPrevImgKeyDescription.message: Press this key to view the previous image in a gallery.

optNextImgKeyTitle.message: View next image in a gallery

optNextImgKeyDescription.message: Press this key to view the next image in a gallery.
